alert.note: Alert for Auglaize; Mercer (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 29 at 3:30AM EDT until July 29 at 4:15AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 AM EDT FOR WESTERN AUGLAIZE AND MERCER COUNTIES... At 329 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Ohio City to Portland, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Celina, St. Marys, Coldwater, New Bremen, St. Henry, Fort Recovery, Rockford, Wabash, Mendon, Chickasaw, Burkettsville, Buckland, Montezuma, Chattanooga, Kossuth, Tama, Maria Stein and Neptune. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
